messages.subject: Robin on smoking
messages.msgSnippet: Robin, that description of why kids would smoke and why you did was brilliant and perfect.  I m keeping it forever and showing anyone who starts to tell me why
messages.messageBody:
Robin, that description of why kids would smoke and why you did was brilliant
and perfect. I'm keeping it forever and showing anyone who starts to tell me
why they don't let their kids do this or that.

Without kids at school to tell a kid who wishes she were somewhere better
that if she smokes they'll like her better, I wonder how many smokers there
would be in the western world these days, really?

Sandra
